blog.name: rescue3000
blog.title:
Your Brain Is
Your Power
blog.description:
Michelle, 20, bi, single

I dabble in the arts occasionally.

Never judge a book by its cover.

body:
Tony Stark/Iron Man/RDJ

He doesn’t get enough credit for what he has done. RDJ has changed MCU and Iron Man forever I don’t care what someone says in 100 years cause HE IS THE BEST TONY STARK DAMNIT!!!

Tony Stark has PTSD AND ANXIETY. Who wouldn’t when you have the weight of the world on your shoulders????

He had to deal with the death of his parents and found out years later that his ex friends best friend killed them. So yeah he had the DAMN RIGHT TO BE PISSED AT STEVE AND BUCKY OKAY!!!!

It’s been almost 11 years now and Tony Stark/Iron Man/RDJ started all of this so I honestly think he will not die in Endgame because to me they really shouldn’t even though it is an end of an era but STILL!!

So yes I freaking love Tony Stark who is the TRUE HERO because the suit is literally just a DAMN SUIT NOTHING MORE CAUSE TONY CONTROLS IT!!! So if anyone ever tries to come at me saying “he’s not a true hero” “Steve is the better hero” I WILL FUCKING LOSE IT!

Tony has felt and dealt with so much more than any of the DAMN ADVENGERS OKAY?!? I mean just watch all the Iron Man movies and any movie Tony Stark is in AND PAY FUCKING ATENTION TO HIM CAUSE HE IS ALSO FRUCKING GENEROUS TO COLLEGE KIDS PAYING FOR ALL THEIR PROJECTS TO BE FUNDED AND HE ACTUALLY CARES ABOUT PEOPLE!!!!

Not only that STAN LEE EVEN SAID RDJ IS THE PERFECT IRON MAN!!! RDJ has be to Hell and back since he was a kid. I won’t go into detail cause even RDJ avoids the subject cause he wants to forget it. He also get to set early to thank all the crew and makes sure people are paid more when they should be! So just think about how much Tony Stark changed from comics to movies BECAUSE OF RDJ!!! He is just the best. I’m so proud to say: Tony Stark is my favorite hero and RDJ is my role model.

Thanks for coming to my ted talk! Much love 💕

blog.name: mostly-imagines
blog.title: Imagines & Such
blog.description: i’m Paris and i write Imagines + Headcanons // Requests for headcanons are open (not imagines!) // Masterlist // Characters I Take Requests For // TO-DO List

title: Being an Avenger Pt. 2
body:
I’ve decided to make this a sort of mini-series of headcanons that’ll follow the story lines of the movies more closely. They will include Avengers 1, Age of Ultron, Civil War, and Infinity War. This part is about Avengers 1. Enjoy!

*Your powers are like Blink’s in X-Men DOFP/Gifted*

  • You were first approached by Nick Fury a while after Thor had first arrived on Earth.
  • SHIELD had been observing you, due to your gifts of teleportation that you’d kept.. less than secret.
  • You’d frequently used them in public in the heat of the moment to help people, like when someone almost got in a deadly car crash, you blocked it with one of your ‘worm holes.’
  • You aren’t really sure where you sent them because it happened so fast, but there’s a 90% chance they ended up okay.
  • Fury had gone to your New York apartment and informed you that he was looking to put together a kind of team. The kind of team that helped people when no one else could.
  • As much as you did want to help, you weren’t really the type to be on any kind of team, let alone a crime fighting one. That, and you weren’t sure your powers could handle being used that frequently.
  • You declined his offer, and asked him not to ask again.
  • A couple years later you’d seen on the news that there had been attacks in New York by a god.
  • It sounded completely unbelievable, but also made sense in a way, with all these powerful people rising up.
  • And not long after that, New York City was told to be immediately evacuated, due to ‘unknown forces.’
  • And with the recent attacks, everybody knew exactly what that meant. 
  • Since Fury had tried to recruit you, you had been practicing with your abilities and had gotten a pretty good handle on them. 
  • You decided that now was as good of a time as any to save the world. 
  • Most people scurried out of New York as fast as they could, but you went towards the fighting. 
  • You slipped past the police who were trying to usher civilians away from the fighting.
  • You immediately saw the infamous Captain America fighting a group of Alien looking creatures down the block, and he was getting cornered. 
  • You opened a worm hole in front of yourself, the other side right behind him. You pulled him through and closed it quickly. 
  • He looked at you in shock and confusion over what had just happened but before he could say anything, you opened another one over the aliens, which he jumped through and attacked. 
  • You continued to use this method until the group were all dead. ‘
  • He clearly wanted to ask you what the hell that was, but settled for a nod, as you were flat in the middle of a battle.
  • Every now and then you’d cross paths with a new avenger, and without fail they’d look at you like despite the alien invasion currently happening, you were the weirdest thing happening there. okay sure Jan
  • Nonetheless, they all figured out quickly that you were friendly and allowed you to fight with them as an ally.
  • You helped get Tony to the ground when he fell from the sky
  • By the end they were all too tired to ask any questions about where the hell you came from so they settled for asking your name and then you all went to get Shawarma, which was surprisingly really good.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Girls Night Out
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Hi2wRk

by QueenofSchmoop

The female Avengers decide they need a night out, without the guys. Secrets are revealed, bonding takes place and much fun is had by all-except maybe the guys.

Words: 8909, Chapters: 2/2, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel (Comics), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, Multi
  • Characters: Pietro Maximoff, Wanda Maximoff, Pepper Potts, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Maria Hill, Thor (Marvel), Jane Foster (Marvel), Clint Barton, Laura Barton, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Happy Hogan, Vision (Marvel), Jack Kirby, Stan Lee, OMC (brief), Friday (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Pietro Maximoff/Wanda Maximoff, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Bruce Banner/Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton/Laura Barton, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Steve/Peggy (past) - Relationship, Thor/Jane Foster
  • Additional Tags: Sibling Incest, Established Relationship, Girls’ Night Out, Light Angst, Humor, Skinny Dipping, Chocolate, Strippers (discussion of), Dancing, Clubbing, Creepy and sexist behavior from OMC, Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie) Spoilers, Post-Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie), Pre-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), AU in that Pietro is still around and Bruce did not leave


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Hi2wRk

title: Spider-Men
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QFwkGQ

by littlestephen

The city needs Spider-Man.
The city needs the friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.
However, when Spider-Man stops coming, people starts to beg for him to come back.
Until a Spider-Man came. A black and red Spider-Man. The new Spider-Man.

Or

Peter Parker gave up on being Spider-Man after his aunt’s death and Miles Morales starts acting like Spider-Man to save people.

Words: 1013, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Characters: Miles Morales, Peter Parker, Ganke Lee, May Parker (Spider-Man), Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Miles Morales & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Miles Morales, Ganke Lee & Miles Morales, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Miles Morales & Tony Stark

summary: I'm Reminded Of The Fool I Was
title: I'm Reminded Of The Fool I Was
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VWeuDo

by TinyandSteve

Even after months after the events, he longed and missed the other. But sometimes it wasn’t enough to sooth his aching heart.

Or; Tony is still suffering after the so-called Civil War

blog.name: tony-stark-ing
blog.title: Caution: Genius At Work
blog.description: Welcome to the workshop of genius, futurist Tony Stark! Stop on by and admire this Avenger in all of his fabulous forms!

summary: I was reading Iron Man issue #23 (1998) and I got to the Stan’s Soapbox page. AKA, the page where Stan Lee used to answer fan...
body:
I was reading Iron Man issue #23 (1998) and I got to the Stan’s Soapbox page. AKA, the page where Stan Lee used to answer fan questions.

I died at the irony of this question and Stan’s answer.

Little did he know in the following years, Disney would come to own Marvel.

reblog.comment:
I was reading Iron Man issue #23 (1998) and I got to the Stan’s Soapbox page. AKA, the page where Stan Lee used to answer fan questions.

I died at the irony of this question and Stan’s answer.

Little did he know in the following years, Disney would come to own Marvel.

trail.content_raw:

Little did he know in the following years, Disney would come to own Marvel.
trail.content:

I died at the irony of this question and Stan’s answer.

Little did he know in the following years, Disney would come to own Marvel.

blog.name: fictional-downey
blog.title: Fictional Downey
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to my Robert Downey Jr. fanfiction blog! I'm a HUGE fan of RDJ (and not just since he took on the role of Iron Man I've loved him for YEARS). Yes, I know there is TONS of fanfiction out there and mine isn't anything special, but I'm posting anyway ;-). I'll post chapter by chapter, BUT also have all the finished chapters posted under the "The Stories" link below. Feedback is appreciated - even POLITE criticism. Have fun (and yes, there are ADULT chapters)!

summary: There was a bit of a theme for the house this Christmas. Spider-Man glass measuring cup, Iron Man coffee maker and spoon/spatula...
